TopicTitle: Some assistance finding a post please :)

Articles.Content:
Ok, so heres the deal..

I was at work a few days ago and found a brilliant post someone had made that listed ALL .22 compatible mods and had them organized very well. I was going to come home and download them all so I had them...however I cannot locate the post now for the life of me, and it seems the search function is...very Kerbal..

Could anyone assist me in finding this post again?

Thanks in advance!

EDIT: Figures as soon as I post this I tried one more search and found it...Ignore this post!

Edited October 28, 2013 by PhsycoTimmay
